about.title: About
about.description: Symbiota Docs v1.4 is a central repository for documentation regarding Symbiota-based data portals. This site is maintained by the Symbiota Support Hub, but all Symbiota users are encouraged to contribute. Contact Us to contribute or provide feedback on this site.

Editor Guide/Collection Statistics/colle.title: Collection Statistics
Editor Guide/Collection Statistics/colle.description: This page describes how you can find information about how many occurrences and images you have in your collection.

Editor Guide/Joining An Existing Portal/.title: Joining an Existing Portal
Editor Guide/Joining An Existing Portal/.description: Click the button below to find a list of active Symbiota portals. You will want to select a Symbiota portal that matches the scope of your data. You can add your data to a Symbiota portal as a "live" collection or a "snapshot" (see this page for more information about management types in Symbiota portals).

Editor Guide/Joining An Existing Portal/.title: Management Types
Editor Guide/Joining An Existing Portal/.description: There are two main ways that collections present their data in Symbiota portals

Editor Guide/Joining An Existing Portal/.title: Managing Multiple Portals
Editor Guide/Joining An Existing Portal/.description: What do I do if I have multiple collections? Should I keep them all in one portal?

New Feature.title: New Feature
New Feature.description: v1.4 has this new feature detailed herein. Yay!

New Feature2.title: New Feature 2
New Feature2.description: v1.4 has this new feature detailed herein. Yay 2!

User Guide/Accessibility.title: Accessibility Options
User Guide/Accessibility.description: Users who create accounts in the portal can adjust Accessibility Preferences, which are designed to improve accessibility to the site for people with disabilities. More information about accessibility as defined by U.S. Section 508 can be found here.
